result.title: A favorite problem!
result.content:
Hello Codeforces!

I would like to ask a question that popped into my head a while ago. Do you remember one single problem in Codeforces rounds that extremely excited you? I was thinking of problemsetting and thus I started wondering what makes different people feel happy while solving certain problems.

I can share mine as well. Personally, I have participated in not so many rounds so my choice might look weird. Here it is: 705D - Человек-муравей.

Have a nice day!
